name: Webpack
description: A powerful module bundler for JavaScript applications.

name: Vite
description: A fast build tool that leverages native ES modules and modern browser features.

name: Parcel
description: A zero-config web application bundler with fast performance.

name: Rollup
description: A module bundler optimized for smaller and faster libraries.

name: Gulp
description: A toolkit to automate & enhance your workflow using JavaScript-based tasks.

name: Grunt
description: A JavaScript task runner for automation of repetitive tasks like minification and compilation.

name: Babel
description: A JavaScript compiler that converts modern ES6+ code into backwards compatible JavaScript.

name: ESBuild
description: An extremely fast JavaScript bundler and minifier written in Go.

name: Snowpack
description: A lightning-fast frontend build tool for modern web apps, now succeeded by Vite.
